divs: sighting detailsi was outside feeding the chikens from my lawnchair it was sunny with perfect visibility. i heard an airplane so i looked up and saw it then to the left and substantially lower i saw a metallic sphere which remained motionless for about 2 minutes. there was nobody around and my phone was inside my residence which is unusual for me. i went inside to get it so i could call my neighbor so he could see it too, but when i came back out about 7 seconds later it was gone without a trace! this is the first time i have seen one during the day i ususally star\ufo gaze at night with my 3rd gen+ night vision equipment and see them regularly. since this is the first time i,ve seen one in the day i thought it would be worth mentioning here. there seems to be a lot of activity lately culminating yesterday. if you have a team in this area it might be worth your time to come over and investigate, i have cameras and several night vision devices and i can tell you with complete certainty that what we have here is a "hot spot". best regards sal loredo sweethome, oregon. usa
